easy.q: I am a round fruit you might eat at lunch, with a core inside. What am I?
easy.hint: Starts with A and you can crunch it.

medium.q: I am a word of letters three; add two, and fewer there will be. What word am I?
medium.hint: Think of a tiny amount and a changing count.
